title: 32nd Annual A. James Speyer Memorial Lecture & Dinner Featuring Artist Rachel Harrison
title_display: 32nd Annual A. James Speyer Memorial Lecture and Dinner Featuring Artist Rachel Harrison
short_description: A remarkable evening featuring artist Rachel Harrison and a seated dinner.
list_description: Enjoy a remarkable evening featuring artist Rachel Harrison and a seated dinner.
description:
Celebrate a distinguished contemporary artist whose work is represented in the museum's collection during this annual program honoring James Speyer, curator of modern and contemporary art at the Art Institute from 1961 to 1986. This year, join us for an enlightening lecture by artist Rachel Harrison, followed by a gallery viewing of her work and seated dinner in the Modern Wing.

Please note that this event is only open to current Sustaining Fellows. Learn more about the Sustaining Fellows here.

Registration is required. Please call (312) 443-3735 or email sustainingfellows@artic.edu for more information.
buy_button_caption: Tickets for this special event are $175 per person. Registration is required. Please call (312) 443-3735 or email sustainingfellows@artic.edu for more information.
